name: Gl-Ube
description:
Glube is lost.

Navigate an eerily empty facility, solving bite-sized systemic puzzles, exploring, and acquiring items as you try to escape.

Exploit Glube's glubbyness to reach new areas, and overcome their shortcomings with clever manipulations of the environment around you.

Gl-Ube encourages creative uses of objects to solve puzzles in unique ways, and sometimes requires you to rethink prior puzzles in a new light to explore new areas of the facility.
